item.description:
Do you love the music of Sam Cooke, Otis Redding, Sam and Dave, etc? Do you often wish you could go dancing but don't like going alone and your roommates/cousins/workmates aren't willing? Would you like to go anyway but would like some support and friendly faces that you know? Then let's all get together and go dancing on a Sat night at the beautiful SpringStep bulding in Medford. This mothly dance is very beginner friendly and a LOT of fun and a great opportunity to meet different people.

We can meet at a local Medford restaraunt (TBD but prob within walking distance) for drinks/snack first. Everybody will have a chance to meet each other and break the ice a bit before we walk over for the free 1 hour lesson at 8pm. The dance starts at 9pm, and the cost is $18. I'm excited about this because I *love* soul music!!

More details here:
http://www.bluescafeb...

Band info here:
http://www.myspace.co...
item.name: Swing/Soul/Blues Dancing on a Sa.t night in Medford
